no_arguments: Sorry, but the c!shred command expects 1 or 2 arguments. Please see c!help for more details.
error_nopeeking_1: Sorry, but I either could not find the {1} card in the database, or you do not have it. Make sure that you spelled it right!
no_item_1: Sorry, but I could not find the {1} card in the database. Make sure that you spelled it right!
dont_have_1: Sorry, but you don't have the **{1}** card in your inventory.
not_enough_1: Sorry, but you do not have enough **{1}** cards in your inventory.
shred_confirm_1: <@{1}>, do you want to shred your {2} **{3}** card{3s}? **This cannot be undone.** Click the Yes button to confirm and No to deny.
reaction_dont_have: An error has occured. Please make sure that you still have the card in your inventory!
reaction_not_enough_1: An error has occured. Please make sure that you still have enough **{1}** cards in your inventory!
denied_message_1: <@{1}> has successfully stopped the shredding of {2} **{3}** card{2s}.
